page.title: 12FARMING AROUND BERROW
page.content: Farming is the chief industry in this area and the farms are mainly in the 15O - 3OO+ acre category. The farming operations include both{dairy {and beef cattle}and{sheep}enterprises, with only a small amount of {pig-farming}and quite a large amount of{arable cultivation.}Some farmers in the area are tenants: others are owner-occupiers. The area also contains quite an acreage of{common land,}Coombe Green Common itself and land along the Eastern slopes of the Southern end of the Malvern Hills, where some residents are entitled to run approved amounts of{livestock. There is a cherry orchard in the area. Along Rye Street there is a bird sanctuary. A smallholding in Birt Street produces flowers and soft fruit.
